headline: In contested races, Chester County candidates fail to win endorsement
author: Michael P Rellahan
sentences: Chester County’s two major political parties held their nominating conventions on Thursday but were unable to endorse candidates for office in the contested races put before the committee members — the campaign for U.S. Senate on the Democratic side and the county’s sole congressional seat on the Republican side.
The failure by the parties to choose a preferred candidate for the two races means that those races will be “open” primaries for party v ...
